name: Tributary
description:
ever wanted to really get to know a place?

tributary is a solo project that is still in production.

in the future i am looking to add:

- the ability to check a map, perhaps with changes to the map as you progress

- sound! sound recorded at each node on the map! number one priority!

- a field notebook to look at, with sketches and info about the stuff you see

- maisy gives you hints when you tell her about things you've seen

- fix some of the weird formatting
